explains: adj. 残忍的；野蛮的；无人性的

sentences.en: If it is true that the only paradises are those we have lost, I will know what name to give the tender and inhuman something that dwells in me today.
sentences.cn: 据说只有失去的才是乐园。 如果真是如此，我就知道怎样称呼今天停驻在我心中的、那温柔而不近人情的事物了。

sentences.en: There was a strange inhuman sound.
sentences.cn: 有一种不像人发出的奇怪声音。

sentences.en: The slaughter of whales is unnecessary and inhuman.
sentences.cn: 对鲸的屠宰是不必要且不人道的。
